sources.label: Realscreen — Factual & Documentary
sources.extractionTarget: Extract all article headlines, summaries, executive names, deal announcements, greenlight news, and streamer mentions (Netflix, Disney+, Apple TV+, BBC). Flag any executive reshuffles or first-look deals.

sources.label: C21Media — Factual Genre
sources.extractionTarget: Extract co-production announcements, budget trend signals, funding gap mentions, tax credit news, and partner broadcaster names. Focus on wildlife and natural history content.

sources.label: Wildscreen — News
sources.extractionTarget: Extract Digital-First initiatives, Panda Award category changes, Gen Z audience strategy mentions, conservation storytelling trends, and ethical production debates.

sources.label: Jackson Wild — Blog
sources.extractionTarget: Extract mentions of impact storytelling, conservation data, local storytellers, indigenous knowledge, AI in filmmaking, and ethical production debates. This is the moral compass of the industry.

sources.label: Broadcast Now — Natural History
sources.extractionTarget: Extract technical delivery specs (8K, VR, remote production), UK production house news, Bristol-based company announcements, and any commissioning editor moves.

sources.label: Televisual — Factual
sources.extractionTarget: Extract production craft details: camera rigs, software tools, drone technology, underwater systems, and any mentions of specific production companies and their technical innovations.

sources.label: Trends in Ecology & Evolution
sources.extractionTarget: Extract newly published research on animal behaviour, ecosystem discoveries, conservation crises, and the Annual Horizon Scan of Global Conservation Issues. Flag any 'first observed' or 'never before documented' findings — these are future filming opportunities.

sources.label: Think with Google — Consumer Insights
sources.extractionTarget: Extract YouTube viewing habit data for nature, science, and wildlife content. Look for audience shift signals showing amateur creators gaining market share. Extract any data on Gen Z nature content consumption.

refreshConfig.description: Industry intelligence sources for wildlife documentary market signals
